name: Maneli
title: Daft funk
snippet: Du groove de la rythmique, du lourd
content: Award winning guitarist Maneli Jamal has wowed audiences around the world with his visual style of playing acoustic guitar. He incorporates many musical textures in his performances while keeping rhythm with his two hands but you'll swear he has a trio with him. You've got to visually see him live to experience what you thought is possible with the acoustic guitar. He has over 4 million video views and 50,000+ followers on social media sites making him an artist to watch for.
